summary: The module defines helper utilities to instantiate a document converter and locate PDF test files, and contains an end‑to‑end conversion test that runs the Docling PDF conversion pipeline on a set of PDFs and validates the generated conversion results against expected outputs for two versioned verification schemes.
business_intent: Provide a regression test that confirms the PDF-to‑structured‑data conversion works correctly across library versions, helping maintain conversion quality and detect regressions in the Docling processing pipeline.
